entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
